text: Susan Plum (1944) is an American glass and installation artist. Plum was born in the United States and raised in Mexico City. Her work is included in the collections of the Seattle Art Museum, the US Department of State and the Smithsonian American Art Museum. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists Category:Living people
title: Susan Plum
